haibison.android.lockpattern.util

Class Randoms

  • java.lang.Object
    • haibison.android.lockpattern.util.Randoms

  • public class Randoms
extends Object
    Random utilities.
    Author:
    Hai Bison

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int randInt()
      Generates a random integer.
      static int randInt(int n)
      Generates a random integer within [0, n).
      static int[] randIntArray(int end)
      Generates a random integer array which has length of end, and is filled by all values from 0 to end - 1 in randomized orders.
      static int[] randIntArray(int start, int end)
      Generates a random integer array which has length of end - start, and is filled by all values from start to end - 1 in randomized orders.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • randInt

        public static int randInt()
        Generates a random integer.
        Returns:
        the random integer.

      • randInt

        public static int randInt(int n)
        Generates a random integer within [0, n).
        Parameters:
        n - an arbitrary value.
        Returns:
        the random integer.

      • randIntArray

        public static int[] randIntArray(int start,
                 int end)
        Generates a random integer array which has length of end - start, and is filled by all values from start to end - 1 in randomized orders.
        Parameters:
        start - the starting value.
        end - the ending value.
        Returns:
        the random integer array. If end <= start, an empty array returns.

      • randIntArray

        public static int[] randIntArray(int end)
        Generates a random integer array which has length of end, and is filled by all values from 0 to end - 1 in randomized orders.
        Parameters:
        end - the ending value.
        Returns:
        the random integer array. If end <= start, an empty array returns.
